A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No where near as good as the Empire Strikes Back\, let’s get that out of the way immediately. Snokes death was very anticlimactic and pointless\, we deserve a better back ground and more character development in him. This was obviously Rian hating what JJ did in the previous film. Also\, zero chance Ray came from “nobody” she’s too strong with the force. Lineage has always meant a lot in Star Wars. With that being said this was an excellent Star Wars movie. Kylo Ren is probably the most well thought out villain in the Star Wars cannon. He is the first multi demential bad guy we’ve ever had.
